mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_AUTHOR, BOARD_CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardAuthor}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, BOARD_AUTHOR = #{boardAuthor}, BOARD_UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
